name: Speed Thief
description:
Speed Thief

Make your way out of the hostile streets of Swift City, where opposing bands of bikers with technologic motorcycles can hack each other and steal the speed of their motorcyles.

Credits
  • franopx - art, design and vfx
  • rothbilly - ui designer and artist
  • Warodot - designer, sfx and code
  • bibubobee - code
  • Special thanks to USMGAMES community
